original_text: And in those times there was no peace to him that went out, nor to him that came in, but great vexations were upon all the inhabitants of the countries.
korean_text: 그 때에 온 땅의 모든 주민이 크게 요란하여 사람의 출입이 평안하지 못하며

sentences.original_text: there was no peace to him that went out
nor to him that came in
but great vexations were upon all the inhabitants
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 큰 혼란이 모든 거민에게 임하였느니라
